text: Awesome guys! Thanks for your input. I use Heroku for my bigger (non-HubSpot) web apps. But eager to look into Digital Ocean as well.
Hey <@UGXQK1B7Y> can you share an example of what your API call looks like and the response you are getting back from HubSpot?

Hey <@UGPK538TA>, this endpoint might help - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blog/v3/search-blog-topics>
One of the parameters to include in the URL of your API call is the `active` parameter: ```Filter topics by whether or not they are associated with any published blog posts (true or false).```
